ear.name: ear
ear.transformationDescription:
They quickly begin to shrink and become two neat little holes behind [npc.her] eyes. #IF(npc.getBodyMaterial()==BODY_MATERIAL_FLESH) A layer of [npc.earFullDescriptionColour] quickly grows to cover them, #ELSE Just like the rest of [npc.her] body, they're made out of [npc.earFullDescription], #ENDIF and as the transformation finishes, [npc.she] experimentally [npc.verb(touch)] [npc.her] new feron ear-holes.
[npc.Name] now [npc.has] [style.boldYellow(feron ears)], which are [npc.materialCompositionDescriptor] [npc.earFullDescription].
ear.bodyDescription: [npc.She] [npc.has] a pair of unnoticeable,#IF(npc.isPiercedEar()) pierced,#ENDIF feron ears, which are positioned just behind [npc.her] eyes and are [npc.materialCompositionDescriptor] [npc.earFullDescription(true)].
